Translations.Text: And the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare
(They will find out) on that Day - their Lord is fully Aware of them
The Catastrophe
What is the Catastrophe
Ah, What will convey to you what it is, the Catastrophe
The Day when people will be like moths scattered in confusion
And the mountains will be like flakes of wool
And then, he whose scales are heavy (with good deeds)
Will live in happiness and contentment
But as of him whose scales are light
He will be embraced by an Abyss
Ah, what will convey to you what that is
Raging Fire
The relentless greed of material gains distracts you (from the real purpose of life). (5)
Until you go down to your graves
Nay! But you will come to know
Again, Nay! You will come to know
Nay, only if you could have certain knowledge
You would see it now, the Insurmountable Barrier (in the way of your personal development (29:54), (79)
Finally, you will behold it with sure vision
And, then, on that Day you will be questioned what you did with the boon of life
